basics.name: Samo Seljak
basics.label: Senior Data Engineer
basics.summary: Data professional with experience in data engineering, sustainability, and data science. Highly proficient in Python and SQL. I'm applying to this position because I'm passionate about solving complex problems and having a positive impact on clinical drug development and clinical operations.

work.name: EIVEE
highlights: Generalized and developed the Product Carbon Footprint offering, which drove majority of sales in 2024.
Collaborated with sustainability experts to translate business and regulatory requirements into code.
Developed and maintained the code repository for data transformations.
Onboarded two senior data engineers, working in an agile team setup.
work.summary: Core product development, focusing on scaling and standardizing the company's offerings. Ensuring correctness of business logic and data sources.

work.name: EIVEE
work.summary: Designed and implemented custom data solutions for climate accounting dashboards, working closely with clients to analyze their data landscape and create efficient, scalable pipelines.
highlights: Lead the company's largest and most complex implementation project, delivering significant value and revenue.
Implemented a greenfield solution which later became the company's main offering.
Collaborated closely with product, tech, and customer success departments to ensure efficient delivery.
Contributed to team growth through code reviews and mentoring of junior colleagues.

work.name: CurveX
work.summary: Developed and deployed ML models for ADHD detection in patients based on EEG recordings.
highlights: Developed CNN model with over 80% accuracy in detecting ADHD in children under 14.
Collaborated with neuroscientists to implement custom mental health metrics.
Applied numerical techniques for outlier detection and bootstrapping.

awards.title: Bronze medal
awards.summary: Santa 2022. Yearly optimization competition, placed 55th out of 874.

volunteer.summary: Contributed to open source projects, mainly pandas and sk-learn.
highlights: Expanded coverage of `.attrs` metadata feature for pandas DataFrames.
Expanded coverage of copy-on-write behaviour for pandas DataFrames.
